scripts.dev: pnpm -F @data/models run build && pnpm -F @app/api run dev
scripts.build: pnpm -F @data/models run build && pnpm -F @app/api run build
scripts.db:migrate: pnpm exec prisma generate --schema prisma/schema.prisma && pnpm exec prisma migrate deploy --schema prisma/schema.prisma
scripts.db:seed: pnpm exec prisma db seed --schema prisma/schema.prisma
scripts.db:all: pnpm run db:migrate && pnpm run db:seed && pnpm run db:seed:tiers && pnpm run db:seed:units && pnpm run db:seed:items && pnpm run db:validate
scripts.railway:build: pnpm --filter @data/models run build && pnpm --filter @app/api run build
scripts.railway:migrate: pnpm exec prisma generate --schema prisma/schema.prisma && pnpm exec prisma migrate deploy --schema prisma/schema.prisma
scripts.railway:seed: pnpm run db:seed && pnpm run db:seed:tiers && pnpm run db:seed:units && pnpm run db:seed:items
